details.creator: veraPDF Consortium
details.name: ISO 19005-1:2005 - 6.1.7 Stream objects - File specification
details.description: A stream object dictionary shall not contain the F, FFilter, or FDecodeParms keys

rule.description: A stream object dictionary shall not contain the F, FFilter, or FDecodeParms keys
rule.test: F == null && FFilter == null && FDecodeParms == null

error.message: A stream object dictionary contains one of the F, FFilter, or FDecodeParms keys
